Class Planet

java.lang.Object
models.Planet
Direct Known Subclasses:
GasPlanet, IcePlanet
public abstract class Planet extends Object

  • Constructor Details

    • Planet

      public Planet(String name, double mass, double diameter, double averageTemperature, String surfaceType, boolean hasLiquidWater)
      Constructor for objects of class Planet id of the planet, >= 1000. Default error value 1000
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the planet, max 30 chars
      mass - mass of the planet, measured in ronnagrams earth is approx 6.0rg must be > 0.1 default to 0.1
      diameter - diameter of the planet, measured in kilometres must be > 0.5 default to 0.5
      averageTemperature - Average temperatur of the planet, Average surface temperature in °C must be a value between -400 and 400 default 0
      surfaceType - surface type of the planet, e.g., “rocky”, “volcanic”, “metallic” max 20 chars
      hasLiquidWater - if the planet has liquid water, true or false
